There were no other sightings in Parker on or around February 25th 2012
Summary: My wife and I witnessed a bright reddish light in the northern sky on the way home from dinner.
divs: sighting detailswe were heading north on riverside dr. on our way home from dinner on sat. feb 25, 2012 at a distance of approximately 1\4 mile from our residence when we noticed a bright, reddish light in the northern sky. we drove into our driveway and parked. my wife watched the light while i went into our rv and retreived the camera. the light was gone when i met up with my wife. she stated that it had accellerated to the north and vanished.
